issue.message: Class referenced in the layout file, `androidx.wear.widget.SwipeDismissFrameLayout`, was not found in the project or the libraries
Class referenced in the layout file, `androidx.wear.widget.SwipeDismissFrameLayout`, was not found in the project or the libraries
Class referenced in the layout file, `androidx.wear.widget.WearableRecyclerView`, was not found in the project or the libraries
Class referenced in the layout file, `androidx.wear.widget.SwipeDismissFrameLayout`, was not found in the project or the libraries
Class referenced in the layout file, `androidx.wear.widget.WearableRecyclerView`, was not found in the project or the libraries

This call references a method added in API level 26; however, the containing class androidx.wear.watchface.Renderer.CanvasRenderer is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
